title: Robot Vacuums Map Your Home's DNA
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Robot Vacuums Map Your Home's DNA.

hook.text: A robot vacuum's LIDAR sensor builds a millimeter-accurate 3D map of your home. It knows the layout better than you do.

buildup.text: LIDAR spins a laser 360Â° to measure distances to walls, furniture, and obstacles in real time.

discovery.text: The map enables room-specific cleaning: 'Clean the kitchen' sends the robot straight there via the most efficient path.

twist.text: iRobot considered selling Roomba floor plan data to tech giants. Privacy backlash from users stopped the deal.

climax.text: Modern bots use AI cameras to spot and dodge shoes, cables, and pet wasteâ€”learning your home's clutter patterns.

punchline.text: Your vacuum knows every room's secret corners.
